Summary: cylinder shaped object with random flashing light
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsI'm at an event called whaling days in Silverdale Washington and noticed a bright cylindrical object moving at an extremely high rate of speed with a flashing light spinning around it at random times. The light was white and occasionaly redish orange. It was at a further distance and traveling north and when I asked my wife to see it, I lost sight of it and it was directly above us. When I finally caught sight of it, my wife looked away and it vanished before my eyes. I didn't know what it was and I felt as if it was under intelligent control.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Silverdale
There was one other sighting in Silverdale on or around July 27th 2013
